description:
net/http/httputil: fix race in DumpRequestOut

Fixes issue 2715

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=31956b697e05 ***

net/http/httputil: fix race in DumpRequestOut

Fixes issue 2715

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5614043

There's already a test.  It failed before with GOMAXPROCS=16 & now it
doesn't.


On Wed, Feb 1, 2012 at 2:54 PM, <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> No test?
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5614043/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5614043/>
>
